Package com.src.business

Class ShoppingAssistant

java.lang.Object
com.src.business.ShoppingAssistant
public class ShoppingAssistant
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Mihnea This class handles the main logic of the application. It has access to the database, passed down from the application's driver class.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShoppingAssistant

      public ShoppingAssistant​(DBUtils utils)
      Public constructor of the application, with no extra logic.
      Parameters:
      utils - - access to the database

  • Method Details

    • fulfillOrder

      public void fulfillOrder​(Order order)
      Takes an order, analyzes its requirements and then searches for the requirements in the Stores, in the given customer's priority. It then updates the Order's Product and Store Lists.
      Parameters:
      order - - the Order to be fulfilled

    • checkSale

      public boolean checkSale​(java.lang.String requirement, Store store)
      This method checks if a given requirement is on Sale in a given Store.
      Parameters:
      requirement - - requirement to search for
      store - - Store to search
      Returns:
      - true if the requirement is on Sale in this Store, false otherwise

    • getLowestPrice

      public java.lang.Float getLowestPrice​(java.lang.String requirement, Store store)
      Gets the lowest price of a requirement in a given Store.
      Parameters:
      requirement - - requirement whose lowest price is to be found
      store - - Store in which to search
      Returns:
      - the lowest price of the requirement if found, 0f otherwise

    • getFirstPrice

      public Product getFirstPrice​(java.lang.String requirement, Store store)
      This method returns the price of the first occurence of a requirement in a Store. It ignores Sales.
      Parameters:
      requirement - - requirement to search for
      store - - Store to be searched
      Returns:
      - the Product entity representing the found Requirement

    • generateOutput

      public java.util.List<Order> generateOutput()
      The "main" method of this class. It retrieves the Orders from the database, then iterates through them and fulfills them, and returns the List of fulfilled Orders.
      Returns:
      - the List of fulfilled Orders
